mapper.select: SELECT u.nickname, u.avatar, c.comment_id, c.uid, c.content, c.create_time, c.blog_id, c.parent_comment_id FROM comment c, user u WHERE c.uid = u.uid AND c.blog_id = #{blogId} AND c.parent_comment_id = -1

SELECT u.nickname, u.avatar, c.comment_id, c.uid, c.content, c.create_time, c.blog_id, c.parent_comment_id, c.reply_uid, uu.nickname as reply_nickname FROM comment c, user u, user uu WHERE c.uid = u.uid AND c.blog_id = #{blogId} AND c.parent_comment_id != -1 AND c.reply_uid = uu.uid
